item.title: Fire breaks out in drip irrigation pipeline factory in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[1
2
Hyderabad: A major fire broke out at a drip irrigation pipeline manufacturing factory in Ieeja of Gadwal district on Saturday. Thick plumes of smoke were seen billowing from the factory premises, triggering panic among workers and residents in the surrounding area.According to Ieeja SI Srinivas, the fire is believed to have started in the production or storage section of the factory, where plastic raw materials and finished drip pipes were stored in large quantities.
